\h(《Aika》)Vyse! Over there!
Look at the size of that hole!\e

\h(《Vyse》)The Moon Stone must have caused that. 
It must be huge…  Aika look!  
Water is flowing into the Shrine!\e

\h(《Vyse》)In the Old World, this island was a sacred 
place. These ruins used to be some sort of 
temple. Nobody's been here for generations.\e

\h(《Aika》)Yeah, I've heard stories about this place, too.
I've heard that there are monsters crawling
around inside.\e

\h(《Aika》)But Moon Stones that big are rare! 
We've got to go in and get it!
You know how I can't pass up a treasure hunt.\e
\h(《Aika》)Besides, how bad can it possibly be?\e

\h(《Vyse》)You're right.
We're going treasure hunting!\e

\h(《ヴァイス》)ダメだ、ビクともしない。
島と大陸が合体したせいで
外には出られなくなったんだな。\c

\h(《どうする？》)「出航する」
「島の探索をつづける」\c

\h(《さてと……》)「リトルジャックに帰艦する」
「島の探索をつづける」\c

\h(《さてと……》)「デルフィナスに帰艦する」
「島の探索をつづける」\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)何だ、こいつの体……
見たこともない、不思議な金属で
できてるぞ。\c
